messages.message:
Hi Folks, we’ve been receiving requests from our customers around documentation around our platform’s SDLC (different from the SDLC project).  We’ve attempted to write a document for the same: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1jXPfy34uhB6SdYD3lRoDv1kq-UWCgpruuurXIFtV_VM/edit#

Please take a look and see if there is something amiss.  Would love to incorporate your feedback before shipping this to our customers.
This is such an interesting request. I'm curious, why do they want to know the internals of how we build our software?

There are multiple reasons:
1. Given the size of our company, they want to make sure that we are legit and follow appropriate processes, and that we know what we are doing. 
2. Compliance: A lot of these companies have security teams that ask for these processes from their vendors.  They want to make sure that we are shipping them well tested software
